name: Ball Game Name Lame
description:
This is a game where you try to balance on a long block while balls drop from the sky and try to make you go off balance.

CONTROLS:

Blue Player (Player 1) Movement: A and D

Green Player (Player 2) Movement: Left and Right

R to Restart

Feel free to leave comments if there is a bug that needs fixing.

UPDATE:

24/3/22: Version 1.1: Fixed the problem where the co-op highscore is not working.
